name: waabe-navisworks-mcp
description: Navisworks Manage 2026 MCP Server for element queries and model analysis.

tools.name: get_model_overview
tools.description: Provides an overview of the loaded model (models, histogram, total).

tools.name: get_element_count_by_category
tools.description: Number of elements per category (e.g., Doors/Windows/IfcSpace). Input: category, scope.

tools.name: list_properties_for_item
tools.description: all Properties of an item. Input: canonical_id.

tools.name: get_property_distribution_by_category
tools.description: Provides a complete overview of all models loaded in Navisworks with their property categories and the properties they contain

tools.name: list_items_to_property
tools.description: Lists items by category/property; optional model/value filter. scope AND modelFilter accept IDs or model names; multiple via , ; \n. Input: category, property, scope, modelFilter?, valueFilter?, ignoreCase?, maxResults?

tools.name: run_simple_clash
tools.description: Simple hard clash: scopeA vs. scopeB; optional tolerance_m, test_name. Input: canonical_id[].
